name: visual-novel-manager
description: Visual Novel Manager for Steam Deck

scripts.build-with-rust: pnpm run build:rust && pnpm run copy:rust && shx rm -rf dist && rollup -c
scripts.copy:rust: shx cp backend/vn_core/target/release/libvn_core.so vn_core.so || shx cp backend/vn_core/target/release/libvn_core.dylib vn_core.so || shx cp backend/vn_core/target/release/vn_core.dll vn_core.pyd && (strip -s vn_core.so 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.verify:artifacts: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const req=['plugin.json','main.py','dist/index.js','vn_core.so']; let ok=1; for (const f of req){ if(!fs.existsSync(f)) { console.error('Missing', f); ok=0; } } process.exitCode = ok?0:1;"
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:rust && pnpm run copy:rust && pnpm run build && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run verify:artifacts
scripts.prepare:bundle: pnpm run build:all && shx rm -rf artifacts && shx mkdir -p artifacts/visual-novel-manager && shx cp plugin.json main.py vn_core.so README.md LICENSE package.json pnpm-lock.yaml rollup.config.js Makefile artifacts/visual-novel-manager && shx cp -r assets defaults dist src backend artifacts/visual-novel-manager && shx rm -rf artifacts/visual-novel-manager/backend/vn_core/target
scripts.bundle:tar: tar -czf artifacts/visual-novel-manager.tar.gz -C artifacts/visual-novel-manager plugin.json main.py dist defaults assets vn_core.so LICENSE
scripts.bundle: pnpm run prepare:bundle && pnpm run bundle:tar && pnpm run bundle:zip && shx rm -rf artifacts/visual-novel-manager

author: YangYusen
